ygData.subject: Null Pointer Exception within Class NEATSpecieManager.java
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, If we initialize NEAT with any population size, 28 input neurons, 18 output neurons and config parameter FEATURE.SELECTION=false, we get a null pointer

Hi,
If we initialize NEAT with any population size, 28 input neurons, 18
ou=
tput neurons and config parameter FEATURE.SELECTION=3Dfalse, we get a
null =
pointer exception within the the method "compatibilityScore" of
the class "=
NEATSpecieManager". The Exception looks as follows:

Exception in thread "m=
ain" java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.neat4j.neat.core.NEATSpecieMana=
ger.compatibilityScore(NEATSpecieManager.java:47)
	at org.neat4j.neat.core.=
NEATSpecie.isCompatable(NEATSpecie.java:107)
	at org.neat4j.neat.ga.core.Sp=
ecie.addSpecieMember(Specie.java:110)
	at org.neat4j.neat.core.NEATSpecie.a=
ddSpecieMember(NEATSpecie.java:46)
	at
neat4j.ga.RMINEATGeneticAlgorithm.sp=
eciatePopulation(RMINEATGeneticAlgorithm.java:138)
	at
neat4j.ga.RMINEATGen=
eticAlgorithm.runEvolutionCycle(RMINEATGeneticAlgorithm.java:189)
	at
neat4=
j.ga.RMINEATGeneticAlgorithm.runEpoch(RMINEATGeneticAlgorithm.java:175)
	at=
 neat4j.RobeeEvolution.evolve(RobeeEvolution.java:337)
	at neat4j.RobeeEvol=
ution.main(RobeeEvolution.java:356)

We set a break point at line 47 before=
 the the following if-clause is
executed: 

if (((NEATGene)applicantGenes[a=
pplicantIdx]).getInnovationNumber() =3D=3D
((NEATGene)repGenes[repIdx]).get=
InnovationNumber())

We realized, that the applicantGenes array has a size =
of 550 but from
id 380 there are no NEATLinkGENE instances but only null po=
inters. The
same is with repGenes array.

We guess, that there's no full me=
sh initialized, so thats why some of
the links are initialized with null. 2=
8 times 18 is 504, so there must
be at least 504 NEATLinkGENES. Maybe there=
's a bug, maybe we
understood something wrongly and have to adjust a config=
 parameter.

Anybody experienced the same problem? Is that a bug?

Thanks

=
Iwan
